header.title: Software Engineer Intern | MS CS @ Northeastern | Backend, Distributed Systems, Cloud, AI

resume.summary: MS CS student at Northeastern with 2.4 years of **Software Engineering** experience at LSEG, specializing in **scalable backend systems**, **distributed architecture**, and **cloud technologies** (AWS, Kubernetes). Proficient in **Python, Java, Go**, with a 3.89 GPA. Seeking Spring/Summer 2026 internship to apply **problem-solving** and **clean code** skills to impactful projects. F1 visa, CPT eligible, available for 8 months (Jan-Aug 2026) and open to relocation.

skills.items: Python, Java, Go, TypeScript, C++, SQL
Microservices, REST APIs, Event-Driven, Asynchronous Processing
AWS (Lambda, SQS, API Gateway), Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQL Optimization, Database Design
Django, Flask, Spring Boot, Node.js, Express, Micronaut, Next.js, React
PyTorch, TensorFlow, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning
Git, Agile, TDD, Code Review, Design Patterns, Problem-Solving

bullets: Engineered **event-driven backend systems** processing **7.5M+ XML compliance records** into standardized JSON, serving 180+ countries with **99.9% data integrity**.
Achieved **40 records/second processing speed** and **reduced turnaround time by 35%** for high-priority KYC/AML screening through **multi-queue priority routing**.
Optimized **AWS Lambda-based microservices** and APIs, **reducing request latency by 40%** via batch processing and performance tuning.
Implemented robust **security hardening** (AWS WAF, IAM, TLS) across services, **reducing security incidents by 50%** and ensuring **zero-downtime migrations**.
Collaborated with **7 cross-functional teams** on feature development, contributing to **code reviews** and technical discussions to ensure **clean, maintainable code**.
Developed **high-throughput Python data processing pipelines**, improving system throughput **3x** through **concurrent execution** and **API orchestration**.
Designed and integrated **microservices**, automating data workflows and **reducing manual interventions by 50%** for critical business processes.
Optimized **database query performance** and ETL pipeline efficiency, **reducing data processing latency by 35%** and improving data extraction **accuracy by 20%**.
Implemented comprehensive **monitoring, scheduling, and error-handling frameworks** to ensure **60% efficiency improvement** and system reliability.

projects.title: Orion Platform
projects.tech: Go, Kubernetes, Operator SDK, Docker, CRDs
projects.bullet1: Developed a **Kubernetes Operator in Go** (1.5K+ lines) for a cloud-native PaaS, enabling **single-command application deployment** across environments.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **custom CRDs** for environment-aware provisioning (PostgreSQL, Redis, MinIO), ensuring **sub-second synchronization** and lifecycle management.

projects.title: Dino Game Deep RL Agent
projects.tech: Python, PyTorch, Deep Reinforcement Learning, ResNet, Computer Vision
projects.bullet1: Engineered an **autonomous AI agent** using **Double DQN with PyTorch** and a **ResNet CNN** (1.5M parameters) to master Chrome's Dino game.
projects.bullet2: Achieved **90% validation accuracy** with **GPU-accelerated training**, real-time screen capture, and a balanced experience replay buffer.

projects.title: Port Management System
projects.tech: Django, MySQL, Python, Advanced SQL, Stored Procedures, Dijkstra Algorithm
projects.bullet1: Built an **advanced maritime logistics platform** using **Django and MySQL**, featuring **50+ stored procedures** and **15+ interconnected tables**.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **Dijkstra's pathfinding algorithm in SQL** for optimal route calculation, handling **10K+ port combinations** with sub-second response.
